channel.description: Recent content in Virus Scans on simeononsecurity

item.title: VirusTotal PowerShell Modules
item.description: A collection of PowerShell Modules for Interacting with the VirusTotal API Notes: You’ll need your VirusTotal API key, which can be found on your Shodan Account Examples of the APIs used in the modules may be found on the VirusTotal Developers Page Download and Install Download the modules from the GitHub Repository Install all the modules Get-ChildItem -Recurse *.ps1 | Import-Module
